description:
The Rush Polar GTX is a super comfortable winter hiking boot, equipped with warm insulation and features for cold days in the snow. The extended cuff is made of stretch material and stops snow from getting down inside the boot.

  • Uppers are durable suede panels with lightweight nylon fabric cuffs
  • Extended ankle collar provides extra support and snow protection
  • GORE-TEX® Insulated Comfort membrane for waterproofness and breathability
  • DST frame stabilizes feet and provides torsional rigidity
  • PrimaLoft® Gold Eco offers incredible warmth to weight ratio and breathability
  • High-density compression-molded EVA midsole cushions and comforts underfoot
  • Presa® outsole with H-compound rubber and IKS technology absorbs shocks and grips to slippery and loose surfaces
name: Scarpa Rush Polar GTX Insulated Winter Boots - Unisex
